tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
i am p c Gaykwad residing at kalyan retired officer 72 age. I was having abnormal and UN  bearable knee pains in both the legs. i had decided to take treatment form artho doctor. on going through cghs approved list, i saw the name of MPCT  hospital sanpada. On inquiry and after the taking the appointment of dr sntosh shetty, i mate him in the third week of march 19 and explained my   knee problem. i am happy to mentioned here that within one hour and after  taking the xeray, he suggested me to go for knee replacement operation. Accordingly Mr Santosh Shetty had operated me on 9 th April 19 and replaced my knee .  I was not having unbearable problem after operation ..Dr. Shetty behaved me friendly & very politely . Third day after operation, I was able to  up & down the stare case with the help of physiotherapist . With in 3 months I was start walking without the support stick. 
I observed that by every 15 days doctor was taking the follow up report about my operation from me ,which may not followed by other doctors/hospital. 
Dr. Shetty is a very throw genital man ****** **** **** ********* ** *** ******** He looks as prince but behaving as a common man with all patients with helpful nature. He is not  behind the money out of package fixed by the hospital . I have decided to go for knee replacement  operation of my left legs. ** **** ** *** **** ** ****** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I L.G.Kamatar had a great experience with Dr.Santhosh sherry.He is more efficient and dynamic doctor.At my 1st consultion with him filled my mind more hope of regaining my original knee strength and power of walking stability with 0% of pain after total knee replacement surgery as I had full left knee pain due to damaged cartilage. At doctor's direction I went for TKR surgery of my left knee on 9th Jan 20, and discharged on 11th Jan.In these 3 days they practiced standing, walking staircase climbing ,really wonderful experience.Now 20 days over ,had good physiotherapy due to this I can walk and climb staircase without any support
MPCT hospital has good staff and doctors especially Dr.Deepali Rathod,and staff Sonali madam and Yaksha madam are very service motive & other staff are also good
I recommend MPCT to all required peoples

It was very bad experience. They have booking of 4 patients of same time including me that is 8.30pm. I arrived at time but they said that first come first serve. Then also some random people came n they gave entry first. I was in too pain and waiting for my turn. I though the doctor was gossip with one person in his cabin more than half hour. After some complaint from the doctor came rudely answer. After that he handles all pending patient with 2-3 minute each.It was very horrible experience and expect this type of behavior and management from such qualified doctor.

not happy with the doctor's consultation,  I had a pain in my left shoulder blade *** ***** ** ***** **** ***** *** suggested medication ********* *** ******** *** ***** ** ** ****** ** *** ** it's been 3 months now

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My name is SJ Shetty (Seetharam Shetty) age 72 years. I was a middle-distance runner and participated in many sporting events during my younger days. But since the last 10/15 years, I am suffering from severe knee pain and am unable to walk. As a result, I lost self-confidence and confined myself to the four walls of my house. I did a lot of treatment, met quite a few doctors and many suggested knee replacement surgery but I was not convinced.  

My two sisters-in-law did their knee replacement surgeries with Dr Santosh Shetty and after seeing their progress and their confidence I approached Dr Shetty who explained the difficulties I may face later on and the benefits of knee replacement. 

Finally, I have gone through the right knee replacement and my knee which was meant inwards has straightened out making me feel much better. Waiting to get totally free of knee pain after my left knee replacement. I thank Dr Santosh Shetty for his guidance and treatment.

Well Qualified, Understanding, Kind in Nature, and Proper guidance. I consulted him for my Father's Knee Replacement Surgery Recently and he helped us a lot with everything. A knowledgeable and experienced doctor without any Ego is highly recommended. 

Thank you so much doctor for everything you did for us. Only this I can do for you.  God Bless You.  - Krutika (Daughter of Bhupendra Mistry)

He is very experienced, he is proactive and he knows in detail, I take my mom to some other doctor she did not identify the problem but this doctor identified the problem and give me the solution. I would like to recommend the doctor, he explained the issue well, the hospital staff is very good.

he was busy with his own advocate and made us wait at 10:30pmalso his staff did not have any coordination among themselves, they sent some other people in when the other guy told us to go in. then the lady said sorry for sending someone else in in our place. we had to wait even more with that pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor explained  about my desease  in clear terms and advised   the patient to see  another specialist Doctor in the hospital. He called the assisting medical staff and instructed him to take me to specialist doctor in person.  I appreciate  Dr. Santosh Shetty for the above help.

My ailing mother of 95 years with Major Kidney problemswas made to wait more than 3 and half hours. Extremely rude reception, extremely mismanaged who let in random patients ( probably their friends)DO NOT COME Best to fix your problems at home and be happy forever rather than wasting your time here
